name: CellProfiler
description: Open-source software for measuring biological phenotypes from images. It allows users to create modular pipelines for image processing and feature extraction.

name: PyCytominer
description: A Python package for processing image-based profiling data, including normalization, feature selection, and aggregation of single-cell data.

name: DeepProfiler
description: A software tool for learning feature representations from single cells in microscopy images using deep learning.
